title: "Resurrecting Anthroposophy: A Report from 2033": Great Lakes Branch of the Anthroposophical Society in America - Ann Arbor Observer
description: Branch member John Beck, the longtime former Anthroposophical Society in America communications director, discusses his lifetime work in communications and cultural activism and the legacy of Rudolf Steiner's philosophical teachings. 7:30 p.m., Rudolf Steiner House, 1923 Geddes Ave. Free, but donations welcome. dwight.ebaugh@gmail.com, 276-5294.
